casebody.data:
WILKIE
v.
CITY OF BOILING SPRING LAKES 44PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 26, 2017 James P. Cauley, III, Attorney at Law, Wilson, David M. Rief, Attorney at Law, Geneva L. Yourse, Attorney at Law, Cary, Jack Cozort, Attorney at Law, for City of Boiling Spring Lakes. Kurt Blaine Fryar, Attorney at Law, for Wilkie, Edward F., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of May 2017 to Withdraw as Counsel of Record by Geneva L. Yourse:

*278"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of May 2017."
